reviews.review_text: I bought this phone 2 days ago I really liked it 1. Performance is quite good and no issues till now 2. Display is good, more than expected 3. Sound is very low and lack of quality and missing BOOMSOUND 4. Camera is above average and couldn’t find it easy than HTC camera app PROS 1. Nice design 2. Good Display 3. Good Performance CONS 1. No HTC Contact, people and music Apps 2. No Boomsound 3. Poor Audio 4. Poor quality Earphones and Charging Cable Best phone under 16000 but missing vintage HTC.
reviews.review_header: Good phone but NOt an Vintage HTC phone

reviews.review_text: The flashlight stopped working as well asbthe front camera flashlight stopped working after 17 days.
Very fast and easy to use build quality is so good

I got it in exchange of my old moto with a very good bargain. This product is featurewise worth not more than 12k. Happy with its battery and other features except camera. Camera is not as sharp as my old moto G3.
reviews.review_header: A good bargain if you get it below 12k.

reviews.review_text: Many problems occur like front & back flash is not working. Misbehaving Screen touch .( Amazon.in I need to change phone, I'm not happy)
Battery is getting fast drained when it is less than 50%. Camera quality is good and some times hanging issues occurred
